documentType: FBI Guardian Complaint Form / E-Tip Submission
summary: This is an FBI Guardian Complaint Form documenting an online tip submitted on January 24, 2023, to the FBI's National Threat Operations Center. The tipster self-reports being coerced into molesting a child by an older man, and alleges past sexual trauma, participation in sex acts with minors at Jeffrey Epstein's home, and attendance at Epstein's sex parties. The tipster also mentions Ghislaine Maxwell and discusses memory loss from trauma.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named by the tipster as the person whose home was the location for sex parties and sex acts with minors. Described as an 'angel investor' who frequented comedy open mics in Orlando and South Florida.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned by the tipster as someone with whom they participated in sex acts alongside Jeffrey Epstein while minors were present.

connections.description: The tipster alleges participating in sex acts with both Epstein and Maxwell while minors were present, indicating their association in the alleged activities.
The tipster states they attended at least one or two of Epstein's sex parties, socialized with him on other occasions, and that Epstein frequented comedy open mics the tipster attended.

events.title: FBI Online Tip Submission
events.description: An individual submitted an online tip to the FBI National Threat Operations Center via tips.fbi.gov, self-reporting being coerced into child molestation and making allegations regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Computer Hacking and Memory Trigger
events.description: The tipster alleges their computer was hacked in June 2021, and they were shown footage of themselves having sex with minors, which triggered blocked memories of past events.

events.title: Reference to Prior Report Date
events.description: The document references a 'Date of Report' field with the date 2009-09-01, though its connection to the 2023 tip is unclear from the provided text.

locations: Fort Lauderdale, Florida (mentioned as possible location of Epstein's home where acts occurred)
Orlando, Florida (mentioned as location of comedy open mics frequented by Epstein)
South Florida (mentioned as location of comedy open mics frequented by Epstein)
keyFacts: An individual submitted an online tip to the FBI in January 2023, alleging they were coerced into molesting a child by an older man.
The tipster claims to have participated in sex acts with minors at Jeffrey Epstein's home, possibly in Fort Lauderdale, as part of an 'initiation process' to be invited to future sex parties.
The tipster alleges participating in sex acts with both Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell while minors were present.
The tipster states they attended at least one or two of Epstein's sex parties and socialized with him, noting Epstein frequented comedy open mics in Orlando and South Florida.

The tipster cites significant memory loss and brain damage from trauma, with memories being triggered in June 2021 after their computer was hacked and they were shown alleged footage of themselves with minors.
